kpi.name: M1006C249

kpi_info.title: RADIO BEARER CONFIGURED FOR HS-FACH DL
kpi_info.use: "The number of successful radio bearer setups and reconfigurations to use HS-FACH downlink. UPDATED: When the RNC receives positive RRC protocol acknowledgement from the UE after configuring it to use HS-FACH downlink and HS-FACH was not in use before that.The counter is not updated in HS-RACH to HS-FACH reconfiguration."

kpi.kpi_alias: RADIO BEARER CONFIGURED FOR HS-FACH DL
